b551b961-a895-47c8-86b2-4e61b5fc6a36.description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated proficiency of navigating the state and local government market. They have gained an in-depth knowledge of funding, budgets, timing, the buyer’s journey, pre-sales intelligence, procurement, ethics and purchasing regulations. These professionals hold a deep commitment to the needs of the government customer, proficiency in public sector focused sales and actionable understanding of forming trusted partnerships.
b551b961-a895-47c8-86b2-4e61b5fc6a36.name: Center for Digital Government State and Local Government Market Professional

issuer.summary: issued by Centers for Digital Government & Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 12 self-paced, interactive video modules and post-module knowledge checks to validate learnings.

15eb29a5-7ef9-406e-8e8e-53142ac4e67e.description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated proficiency in understanding the key aspects to succeed in selling and marketing IT products and services to the K-12 and Higher Education markets. They have gained in-depth knowledge of the K-12 and Higher Education market’s structure, size, and scope as well as budgets, funding sources, procurement processes, and drivers that motivate educators, technology leaders and influencers to make IT purchases.
15eb29a5-7ef9-406e-8e8e-53142ac4e67e.name: Center for Digital Education K-12 and Higher Education Market Professional

issuer.summary: issued by Centers for Digital Government & Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 9 self-paced, interactive video modules and post-module knowledge checks to validate learnings.
